component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增耳机一戴即听功能，提升系统稳定性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增耳机一戴即听功能，戴上耳机即可享受自动播放音乐体验。
提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定。
合入安卓2022年9月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.hihonor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2022/9
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”“荣耀俱乐部”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.hihonor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。
Dear user, this recommended update added the function to enjoy automatic music playback once you put headphones on, improved the system stability, and incorporated security patches.
Added the function to enjoy automatic music playback once you put headphones on.

Incorporated Android September 2022 security patches to enhance system security. For information on HONOR Software Security Updates, please reach out to HONOR official website https://www.hihonor.com/global/support/bulletin/2022/9

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data. A backup beforehand is recommended. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. For assistance, please go to the My HONOR or HONOR Club apps, or visit HONOR official website https://www.hihonor.com/cn/contact-us
